newsitem.title: USA: Clinton yet to receive Fed candidate list - official.
newsitem.headline: Clinton yet to receive Fed candidate list - official.

text.p: President Clinton has not yet received a list from his economic advisers of potential nominees to the Federal Reserve Board, a senior Treasury Department official said on Tuesday.
The official, who declined to be named, told reporters that he believed that the administration was "getting close" to deciding on its nominees.
But, in response to a question, he said that a list of potential candidates had not yet been submitted to Clinton.
White House spokesman Mike McCurry said on Monday he doubted there would be announcements on filling the two Federal Reserve Board vacancies this week.
The two posts opened up with the departure earlier this year of Janet Yellen for the White House and Lawrence Lindsey for the private sector.
